name: Pixel Mage Quest
description:
Pixel Mage Quest is a retro RPG game mixed with modern sandbox gameplay experience.

You can play this game as your own! Fighting monsters, questing, gathering resources, crafting items and much more!

Using a classic battle system based on the oldies RPGs plus a deck of cards (you can choose what you bring to combat). Get ready to fight a horde of monsters!

The world of Pixel Mage Quest is vast and alive, visit villages and towns, explore dungeons, discover secrets, resolve puzzles, defeat bosses and much more!

New content and improvments to the game will be added weekly!

Become a Legend of Pixel Mage Quest today! 

I hope you have fun playing my game! 
Support this solo project if you can!
